Literature.Title: Mirabamides A-D, depsipeptides from the sponge Siliquariaspongia mirabilis that inhibit HIV-1 fusion
Literature.Author: Plaza A, Gustchina E, Baker HL, Kelly M, Bewley CA

Literature.Title: Mirabamides E-H, HIV-inhibitory depsipeptides from the sponge Stelletta clavosa

Sequence Information.Target Organism: HIV-1 HxB2(IC50 I=0.144±0.01µM),HIV-1 PsV(IC50 I=1.01±0.33µM),HIV-1(IC50 F=1.3±0.5µM),Human adenocarcinoma TZM-bl(IC50=2.2±0.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(no activity data),HIV-1 PsV(IC50 I=0.123 ± 0.040)
